level.heading: Investigation of Applicants; Issuance of Identification Card; Check Distribution.

placeholder.heading: Adverse action not permitted for refusal to allow entry into home or permit inspection thereof.

level.heading: Temporary Amendments of Section
level.text: For temporary (225 day) repeal of section, see § 2(eee) of Self-Sufficiency Promotion Temporary Amendment Act of 1998 (D.C. Law 12-230, April 20, 1999, law notification 46 DCR 4143).

level.heading: Emergency Act Amendments
level.text: For temporary repeal of section, see § 2(eee) of the Self-Sufficiency Promotion Emergency Amendment Act of 1998 (D.C. Act 12-372, June 9, 1998, 45 DCR 4270), § 2(eee) of the Self-Sufficiency Promotion Legislative Review Emergency Amendment Act of 1998 (D.C. Act 12-425, July 31, 1998, 45 DCR 5682), § 2(eee) of the Self-Sufficiency Promotion Congressional Review Emergency Amendment Act of 1998 (D.C. Act 12-552, December 24, 1998, 46 DCR 521), and § 2(eee) of the Self-Sufficiency Promotion Congressional Review Emergency Amendment Act of 1999 (D.C. Act 13-19, February 17, 1999, 46 DCR 2492).

level.heading: Legislative History of Laws
level.text: For legislative history of D.C. Law 12-241, see Historical and Statutory Notes following § 4-201.01.

placeholder.heading: Notification of adverse action not permitted.

level.heading: Temporary Amendments of Section
level.text: For temporary (225 day) amendment of section, see § 2(fff) of Self-Sufficiency Promotion Temporary Amendment Act of 1998 (D.C. Law 12-230, April 20, 1999, law notification 46 DCR 4143).

level.heading: Emergency Act Amendments
level.text: For temporary repeal of section, see § 2(fff) of the Self-Sufficiency Promotion Emergency Amendment Act of 1998 (D.C. Act 12-372, June 8, 1998, 45 DCR 4270), § 2(fff) of the Self-Sufficiency Promotion Legislative Review Emergency Amendment Act of 1998 (D.C. Act 12-425, July 31, 1998, 45 DCR 5682), § 2(fff) of the Self-Sufficiency Promotion Congressional Review Emergency Amendment Act of 1998 (D.C. Act 12-552, December 24, 1998, 46 DCR 521) and § 2(fff) of the Self-Sufficiency Promotion Congressional Review Emergency Amendment Act of 1999 (D.C. Act 13-19, February 17, 1999, 46 DCR 2492).

level.heading: Legislative History of Laws
level.text: For legislative history of D.C. Law 12-241, see Historical and Statutory Notes following § 4-201.01.
